snippet: With one game left, Miguel Cabrera leads the American League in batting average, home runs and runs batted in, putting him on the verge of becoming the first triple crown winner since 1967.
abstract: Detroit Tigers third baseman Miguel Cabrera leads the American League in batting average, home runs and runs batted in with just one game left in the regular season, putting him on the verge of becoming major league baseball's first triple crown winner since 1967.
lead_paragraph: With one game left, Miguel Cabrera leads the American League in batting average, home runs and runs batted in, putting him on the verge of becoming the first triple crown winner since 1967.

headline.seo: Miguel Cabrera Closes In on Triple Crown
headline.main: Cabrera Closes In on Triple Crown
headline.print_headline: Cabrera Closes In On Triple Crown
